ink_core

[−][src]Module ink_core::env

Environmental interface. (version 3)

This is the interface with which a smart contract is able to communicate with the outside world through its sandbox boundaries.

Modules

call

Utilities to call or instantiate contracts on the chain.

hash

Built-in efficient cryptographic hash functions.

test

Operations on the off-chain testing environment.

Structs

AccountId

The default environment AccountId type.

Hash

The default environment Hash type.

Enums

DefaultEnvTypes

The fundamental types of the default configuration.

EnvError

Errors that can be encountered upon environmental interaction.

Traits

Clear

The equivalent of Zero for hashes.

EnvTypes

The environmental types usable by contracts defined with ink!.

Topics

Implemented by event types to communicate their topic hashes.

Functions

account_id

Returns the account ID of the executed contract.

balance

Returns the balance of the executed contract.

block_number

Returns the current block number.

block_timestamp

Returns the current block timestamp.

caller

Returns the address of the caller of the executed contract.

clear_contract_storage

Clears the contract's storage key entry.

emit_event

Emits an event with the given event data.

eval_contract

Evaluates a contract message and returns its result.

gas_left

Returns the amount of gas left for the contract execution.

gas_price

Returns the current price for gas.

get_contract_storage

Returns the value stored under the given key in the contract's storage if any.

get_runtime_storage

Returns the value from the runtime storage at the position of the key if any.

input

Returns the input to the executed contract.

instantiate_contract

Instantiates another contract.

invoke_contract

Invokes a contract message.

invoke_runtime

Invokes a call to the runtime.

minimum_balance

Returns the minimum balance for the contracts chain.

output

Returns the value back to the caller of the executed contract.

println

Prints the given contents to the environmental log.

random

Returns a random hash seed.

rent_allowance

Returns the current rent allowance for the executed contract.

restore_contract

Restores a smart contract in tombstone state.

set_contract_storage

Writes the value to the contract storage under the given key.

set_rent_allowance

Sets the rent allowance of the executed contract to the new value.

terminate_contract

Terminates the existence of the currently executed smart contract.

tombstone_deposit

Returns the tombstone deposit for the contracts chain.

transfer

Transfers value from the contract to the destination account ID.

transferred_balance

Returns the transferred balance for the contract execution.

Type Definitions

Result

A result of environmental operations.
